welcome_message_body: Welcome to Diyarbakir, a city known for its rich history, ancient city walls, and vibrant bazaars. We invite you to explore its charming streets, experience its unique culture, and enjoy all that Diyarbakir has to offer.

restaurants.name: Diyarbakır Kültür Evi
restaurants.description: Diyarbakır Kültür Evi is a café located in Sur.
restaurants.address: Balıkçılarbaşı Dört Ayaklı Minare civarı (Gazi Caddesi), 21100 Sur

restaurants.name: Mardin Kebab Evi
restaurants.description: Mardin Kebab Evi is a middle eastern restaurant located in Diyarbakır.
restaurants.address: dort ayakli minare yani balikcilar basi (Balıkçılarbaşı Yenikapı Sk.), Diyarbakır

restaurants.name: Han Kapısı Kahvaltı ve Yemek Sarayı
restaurants.description: Han Kapısı Kahvaltı ve Yemek Sarayı is a breakfast spot located in Diyarbakır.
restaurants.address: Tarihi Hasan Paşa Hanı (Gazi Caddesi), Diyarbakır

restaurants.name: Fırın-ci Sur
restaurants.description: Fırın-ci Sur is a kebab restaurant located in Diyarbakır.
restaurants.address: Inönü Mahallesi, Gazi Caddesi Telgrafhane Sokak, Tarihi Vahap Ağa Hamamı No: 34  Sur (Gazi Caddesi), 21300 Diyarbakır

restaurants.name: Mustafa'nın Kahvaltı Dünyası
restaurants.description: Mustafa'nın Kahvaltı Dünyası is a breakfast spot located in Diyarbakır.
